title: No, Nirav Modi Didn’t Say He Paid BJP Leaders To Flee India
subtitle: A viral message on Facebook and Twitter claims that fugitive billionaire Nirav Modi at a London court claimed that he did not flee, but was asked to flee by BJP leaders who also took a commission amounting to Rs 456 crore from him
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The claim is false, Nirav Modi made no such statement in court when he appeared on 21 March.

The News18 tweet has been morphed to make it appear as though Modi gave the statement as claimed.
